sentences.en: He gets a kick out of reading the blurb on cereal boxes.
sentences.cn: 他以读谷类食品包装盒上的广告为乐.

sentences.en: I could image the blurb he would have already written about her powers of observation.
sentences.cn: 我可以想象他本该用来描述她细腻观察力的夸张词语.

sentences.en: In the blurb I couldn't see anything about thinking at all.
sentences.cn: 在这本书的简介中，我根本找不到任何有关思想的东西。

sentences.en: This book fails to give what the blurb describes.
sentences.cn: 这本书不像该书护封上所描绘的那样好.

words.tran_cn: 大肆宣传；吹捧性广告；商品信息

trans.tran_cn: （尤指印在书籍等护封上的）简介，推荐广告
